projectDesc.p: Text encoded as part of 'The Digital "Anon": A Digital Genetic Edition of Virginia Woolf's Final Essays'. This project, funded by Leverhulme Grant ECF-2022-602, seeks to construct a TEI-XML based digital edition of the drafts of 'Anon' and 'The Reader', among the final documents Woolf wrote before her death.

p.l: Notes for Reading at Random
Sotheby 2
Reading at Random or Turning the Page
To begin with English country before Eth.
The effect of country upon writers. Hall [Holingshed?]
The idea of the book is to find the end of a ball of
string & wind out. Let one book suggest another.
Keep to time sequence. Pass from criticism to biography.
Lives of people. Always follow the genuine scent –– the
idea of the moment. No periods': no text book.
Read very widely. Write rather from memory.
The Life of a Book
Take a living book & trace, vanishing, its family
But wh. which book? But keep very free.
Harrison. That was England.
His mastiff. Months with an R in them
How many departments a person has: needing historians,
psychologists; poets &c. to interpret.
The forces telling on H. his attitude to the court, the
Church. His regrets for logs of wood as pillows.
Squire Waterton. The continuity of tradition. The RC
Church as a carrier. Harrison seen by Furnivall. What F.
paid for [butter?] in 1878. The inflection; also the medium
The snatch of song: if I were in my castle at [Bovenly?]
The song making instinct. The map of London
Alfred Tennyson. Mrs G H Lewes had reflected: a
meeting was held in [March?]... in Gower St. Street at 8.
This is [coutements?] –– the extension certain emotions always in
being: felt by people always.
For the 19th Century. Aug. [Augustus?] Hare, his mother (repulsive)
Scene illustrating Henry James's subject. Osbert on
Two generations. Sitwell meets Hare.
Might begin be a [fictitious?] review of a book hist history of Eng. Lit. English literature What it omits. Try to write lit the other way round,
define the influences: the affectl the growth; the
surroundings, also the inner current all left out in
text books written for Pulley. Semiramis.
Aspasia –– witches & faeries.
What is creation? The old mMrs F's account.
The virtue of our age that people don't rest on their
laurels. Perpetually broken up. Renewing. No
conclusion. Perhaps the necessary effort of coming
continuing after so many other writers: a great choice of
models –– examples. For instance, Reads admiration for Ruskin.
Reviving the old fashion: No great poet: see Yeats. The
times too big? – or too close to us – for great poetry.
Idea for the shape of the book.
To begin with the country. The eye the youthful
scene. Our floods. This brings back the wildness.
Out of doors. Indoors no study no library
The importance of the audience.
No public, in our sense.
The song... The call to our primitive instincts.
Rhythm. Sound. Sight.
Harrison: at the right distance, at last, to see
England. No one looked before that.
